traceabilityPage.title: Product Traceability
traceabilityPage.description: Trace the journey of your food from farm to fork with a Vibrant Traceability ID (VTI).
traceabilityPage.vtiDescription: A VTI is a unique identifier assigned to each batch of produce, ensuring transparency throughout the supply chain.
traceabilityPage.recentDescription: Explore some of the latest product journeys on the platform.

detailPage.loadError: Failed to load traceability history for this batch.
detailPage.notFoundDescription: The traceability report for this ID could not be found.
detailPage.journeyDescription: A chronological record of events for this batch.
detailPage.noEventDetails: No specific details for this event.
detailPage.noEventsFound: No traceability events have been logged for this batch yet.
detailPage.sustainablyGrownDescription: This product was grown using practices that align with sustainable and organic principles, based on logged inputs.

searchPage.title: Universal Search
searchPage.description: Find anything across the DamDoh platform.
searchPage.placeholder: Search for people, products, services, forum posts...

modal.title: Universal Search
modal.searchErrorDescription: An error occurred while searching. Please try again.
modal.invalidCodeError: Invalid QR code scanned. It does not appear to be a DamDoh ID.
modal.scanErrorDescription: Could not read the QR code. Please try again.
modal.interpretationNotesDefault: Searching for items related to your query.

AppFooter.tagline: The Global Agricultural Supply Chain Platform.

offline.title: You are currently offline
offline.description: Your actions will be saved and synced when you reconnect.

syncing.title: Syncing offline changes...
syncing.description: Uploading {count, plural, one {# action} other {# actions}} to the server.

synced.title: Sync Complete!
synced.description: All your offline changes have been saved.

syncFailed.title: Sync Failed
syncFailed.description: Could not sync all offline changes. Will retry later.

queued.title: Action Queued
queued.description: This action will be performed once you are online.

tooltip.syncing: Syncing {count, plural, one {# pending action} other {# pending actions}}...
tooltip.onlinePending: Online | {count, plural, one {# action} other {# actions}} waiting to sync
tooltip.offline: Offline | {count, plural, one {# action} other {# actions}} queued

hero.title: Cultivating Connections, Harvesting Prosperity with {appName}
hero.subtitle: The essential digital ecosystem connecting every stakeholder in the agricultural value chain. From seed to sale, DamDoh empowers growth, transparency, and collaboration.

features.title: Core Features of DamDoh
features.subtitle: An integrated platform designed to meet the diverse needs of the agricultural community.

networking.title: Smart Networking
networking.description: AI-powered connection suggestions based on your role, location, and needs. Find the right partners, from suppliers to buyers.

marketplace.title: Digital Marketplace
marketplace.description: A direct channel to buy and sell produce, inputs, and equipment. Expand your market reach and find the best prices.

forums.title: Thematic Forums
forums.description: Share knowledge and discuss specific topics like crop management, livestock health, and new technologies with peers.

talent.title: Talent Exchange
talent.description: Offer or find agricultural services, from custom harvesting to drone surveying and professional consultancy.

forWho.title: A Platform for Every Stakeholder
forWho.description: DamDoh is uniquely designed to serve the entire agricultural value chain, creating a single point of truth and opportunity for all.

farmers.title: Farmers
farmers.description: Access better markets, find quality inputs, and get expert advice to increase your yield and profitability.

buyers.title: Buyers & Processors
buyers.description: Source high-quality, traceable produce directly from producers and co-ops, ensuring supply chain reliability.

experts.title: Experts & Service Providers
experts.description: Offer your specialized skills and services to a broad agricultural audience seeking your expertise.

forWho.imageAlt: A diverse group of agricultural stakeholders collaborating

cta.title: Ready to Grow Your Network?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of farmers, buyers, and experts who are building a more connected and efficient agricultural future.

networkPage.title: Find Stakeholders
networkPage.description: Search and connect with all stakeholders in the DamDoh ecosystem.
networkPage.aiSuggestionsDescription: AI-powered recommendations based on your profile.
networkPage.infoTooltip: Suggestions are based on your profile's stated interests and needs.
networkPage.signInPrompt: Sign in to get personalized suggestions.
networkPage.noSuggestions: No personalized suggestions available right now.
networkPage.browseAllDescription: Filter and find exactly who you're looking for.
networkPage.noStakeholdersFound: No stakeholders found matching your criteria.
networkPage.noStakeholdersHint: Try adjusting your search or filters.

toast.requestSentDescription: Your request has been sent to the user.

hub.title: Farm Management Hub
hub.description: Your central dashboard for all farm-related activities, from managing plots and crops to tracking inputs and finances.

myFarms.title: My Farms & Crops
myFarms.description: View, edit, and manage all your registered farm plots and the crops growing on them.

labor.title: Labor Management
labor.description: Keep track of your farm workers, log hours, and manage payments all in one place.

knf.title: KNF Input Assistant
knf.description: Create and track your Korean Natural Farming concoctions like FPJ, FAA, and more.

fgw.title: Farming God's Way Guide
fgw.description: Learn about the principles of FGW, including no-tillage and 'God's Blanket' mulching.

financials.title: Financials & Funding
financials.description: Track farm income and expenses, and apply for loans or grants from financial partners.

seedStarting.title: Seed Starting Guide
seedStarting.description: A comprehensive guide to successfully starting seeds indoors for a head start on the season.

familyFarm.title: 200sqm Family Farm Model
familyFarm.description: Explore a model for a self-sufficient, integrated 200sqm family farm.

assetManagement.title: Asset Management
assetManagement.description: Log and manage your farm machinery, tools, and other physical assets. (Coming Soon)

Marketplace.title: Marketplace
Marketplace.description: Browse and discover products and services.

noItemsFound.title: No items found.
noItemsFound.hint: Try adjusting your filters or search terms.

pinning.pinnedDescription: The Marketplace is now your default homepage.
pinning.unpinnedDescription: The Dashboard is now your default homepage.

createListing.title: Create New Listing
createListing.description: List a product or service in the marketplace.

form.namePlaceholder: Enter the name of your listing
form.relatedVtiPlaceholder: Enter the VTI if this listing is for a specific batch
form.relatedVtiDescription: Linking a VTI increases buyer trust.
form.skillsPlaceholder: List skills needed for the service
form.sustainableDescription: Indicate if this listing involves sustainable practices.

missingInfo.title: Missing Information
missingInfo.description: Please enter a name and description before suggesting a price.

failed.title: Price Suggestion Failed
failed.description: Could not get an AI price suggestion. Please try again or enter a price manually.

authentication.title: Authentication Error
authentication.description: You must be logged in to create a listing.

creation.title: Creation Failed
creation.description: Could not create the listing. Please try again.

booking.dateError: Please select valid check-in and check-out dates.
booking.authDescription: You must be logged in to book a service.
booking.bookedDescription: Your booking is confirmed. Present the QR code below upon arrival.

booking.modalScan: Scan this code to check in

coupon.label: Coupon Code
coupon.failDescription: The coupon code is invalid or not applicable.

order.successDescription: Your order has been placed successfully.
order.failDescription: Could not place the order. Please try again.
order.quantityErrorDescription: Please enter a valid quantity (at least 1).
order.authDescription: You must be logged in to place an order.

notFound.title: Item not found
notFound.description: The marketplace item you are looking for does not exist.

loadItem.title: Error loading item
loadItem.description: An error occurred while loading the marketplace item details.

myOrders.title: My Received Orders
myOrders.description: View and manage orders received from buyers.

auth.title: Authentication Required
auth.description: You must be logged in to view your orders.

shopView.noListings: No listings found for this shop.

manageService.description: Manage bookings and settings for this service.

bookingsTab.title: Service Bookings
bookingsTab.description: View and manage bookings for this service.

settingsTab.title: Service Settings
settingsTab.description: Update details and availability for this service.

form.availabilityDescription: Select dates when this service is available.

errors.notFoundDescription: The service you are trying to manage does not exist.

talentExchangePage.description: Find or offer agricultural services and expertise.
talentExchangePage.noResultsDescription: Try adjusting your search filters or offer your own service to the community.
